headline: 2025-11-03 — Wood Mackenzie analysts (via Reuters) say U.S. nuclear power generation is set to rise this week as surging data‑center demand strains grids; BloombergNEF commentary (Ashish Sethia) confirms AI/data‑center builds are shifting demand patterns. Evidence: Reuters Oct 29 report that nuclear generation is set to rise to meet data‑center demand; BloombergNEF remarks at Bloomberg Green Seattle 2025 on shifting energy demand from new AI data centers.
